name: Albino Zebra
description:
This is a 8x10 canvas piece. 


This is my pride and joy in recreating pop art on canvas without expensive machines. There are so many possible combinations that the sky is literally the limit. If you have any specific colors in mind please contact me , because I would love to make it!

If you have any questions or concerns please come in contact with me. I am available for commissioned pieces as well. my email is justasl [!at] optonline.net

name: Tranquility 3
description:
This is a 16x20 canvas piece.

This series was a mix media series that included Oil, silk screen , acrylic media . During this series i had a small obsession with the beautiful japanese Lotus tree and its inherent ability to make a tranquil image no matter how the image was portrayed.

If you Have any questions please feel free to come in contact with me at justasl [!at] optonline.net , I am also available for commissioned pieces.

name: Old Soul
description:
This is a 11x 14 canvas piece with included frame, for measurement pleasures, add another 3 inches for each direction to insure a snug fit.

This piece was inspired by an old man that was walking down the street at my local town. He seemed droopy old and filled with knowledge. I wondered what this knowledge would look like, how it would shine, what would his life have to uncover.

To stay true to the inspiration of this piece I decided to to create this piece with a vintage quill and french imported ink. The drips , the fades, the final touches are all done by ink and quill

The piece does come with a frame and is ready to hang, but it is not professionally mounted. It is done the DIY way.

If you have any questions please feel free to ask, I am also available for commissioned pieces.

name: Anatomical Vibrance
description:
This is a 24 X 36 Canvas piece.

This is a very interesting one of a kind mixed media piece. It involves multiple types of acrylic ink, aerosol , crayons, markers, etc, the list goes on and on for every little detail.

The piece has taken a total of 5 days to complete, from sketching to the finished product. The reason for this extensive amount was due to the layering of the drips. Since achieve controlled drips is such a random affair, the layers needed to dry before the net color could be melted. From extreme patience and a artistic vision in mind , the layered look was achieved !

The anatomical face was based off of a real model from the late 1950's. the head is specifically oversized to add a comical feature to the mode, and to lighten up the mood. The surroundings were based off a graffiti technique also used in the begins of street art.

This will most likely be the last original piece with a crayon origin, the rest will be commissioned or reproduced. Don't wait on your chance to own this one of a kind original graffiti canvas piece!

I apologize for the high shipping, the piece is delicate and requires care during transportation.

name: Faith
description:
This piece is 11x14 on white canvas.

The pure beauty of this piece comes from the majestic hair and the feeling of hope , faith , and belief. Each stroke of hair was meticulously painted with a color pallet that can need be recreated. The colors were not accidental but made by destiny. 

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask . I am also available for commissioned pieces.
